text: Franciszek Białous (August 7, 1901 - January 14, 1980) was a Polish microbiologist. Between 1955 and 1971, he was the Chair of Microbiology at the Higher School of Agriculture, now . Lucyna Turek-Kwiatkowska: Białous Franciszek. In: Encyklopedia Szczecina. T. 1. Szczecin: Uniwersytet Szczeciński, Instytut Historii, Zakład Historii Pomorza Zachodniego, 1999, p. 91."60 lat II Liceum Ogólnokształcącego" by Monika Adamowska, Gazeta Wyborcza, October 6, 2006, ==Decorations== *Knight's Cross of the Order of Polonia Restituta *Golden Cross of Merit *Medal of the 10th Anniversary of People's Poland ==References== Category:1901 births Category:1980 deaths Category:Polish microbiologists Category:Scientists from Szczecin
title: Franciszek Białous
